fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_notes: Converted from (B) to (A) coding. V-Dem Country Coordinators answers were used for country-years where data was missing in CCP (Elkins et al. 2012).
fxInfo_question: By law, does the lower (or unicameral) chamber of the legislature have the ability to introduce bills in all policy jurisdictions?

fxInfo_responses.value: No, there are policy areas in which the lower (or unicameral) chamber cannot introduce bills.

fxInfo_sources: CCP (Elkins et al. 2012), v263; National constitutions; V-Dem country coordinators.
